issues.description: The visibility directive for fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as global in the template but as extern in the solution. This mismatch could prevent the symbol from being exported in the solution build and confuse students about how to properly expose their function.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the extern directive with a global directive (global fix_vec_sub_asm) so it matches the template and correctly exports the function.
